## RootAPI.getRoutes() method

List all top level routes. See [https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.4/api/\#operation/GetRoutes](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.4/api/#operation/GetRoutes)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```
